smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function setupIdlingResource appears to be too complex.
The function parseVoiceName appears to be too complex.
The function onOptionsItemSelected appears to be too complex.
The function addSelectionPopupMenu appears to be too complex.
The function lookup appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function assertExpectedForwardThesaurusEntryForMistake is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'GeneralPreferenceFragment' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'MainScreenComponent' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'Tts' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ReaderViewModel' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ReaderFragment' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MainActivity' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'PagerAdapter' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'EmbeddedDb' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'ResultListFactory' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'ResultListFragment' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'PoemAudioExport' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function setCompoundVectorDrawables has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function query has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface MainScreenComponent is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

instances.message: This method is overloaded too many times.
This method is overloaded too many times.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function lookup is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength

smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses around the lambda ({ favoriteDao.insert(Favorite(word)) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({ favoriteDao.delete(Favorite(favorite)) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({ favoriteDao.deleteAll() }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({ notifyWotd(context, dictionary) }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses around the lambda ({Wotd.notifyWotd(context, dictionary)}) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (AppModule::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: AppModule::class
Parentheses in (DbModule::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: DbModule::class
Parentheses in (ResultListModule::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ResultListModule::class
Parentheses in (ThreadingModule::class) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ThreadingModule::class
Parentheses in (oldPoemText == null && newPoemText == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: oldPoemText == null && newPoemText == null
Parentheses in (oldPoemText != null && oldPoemText == newPoemText) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: oldPoemText != null && oldPoemText == newPoemText
Parentheses in (newPoemText != null && newPoemText == oldPoemText) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: newPoemText != null && newPoemText == oldPoemText
Parentheses in (after - before) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: after - before
